mapper.select: select a.course_name, a.course_div, a.term_div,a.step_div,a.edu_start_date,a.edu_end_date,a.rcrt_no, (select start_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no order by schdl_seq desc limit 0,1 ) as recruitStartDate, (select end_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no order by schdl_seq desc limit 0,1 ) as recruitEndDate, (select start_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no order by schdl_seq desc limit 0,1 ) as announcementStartDate, (select end_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no order by schdl_seq desc limit 0,1 ) as announcementEndDate, (select schdl_name from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no order by schdl_seq desc limit 0,1 ) as schdlName, (select status_div from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no order by schdl_seq desc limit 0,1 ) as statusDiv, (select schdl_seq from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no order by schdl_seq desc limit 0,1 ) as schdlSeq from entry_sel_master as a where a.term_div like #{termDiv} and a.course_div like #{courseDiv} and a.course_name like #{courseName} and (a.status_div=#{StatusPreparing} or a.status_div=#{StatusPrepared})
